Annotation.note:
The paper [BIB/Wang_95a] gives an overview on Wang's decomposition methods based on pseudo division. Considers examples from geometry theorem proving, finding implicit equations for curves and surface, computing singular loci, computing prime decompositions, robot kinematics.
It discusses the following examples:
Buchberger-87 as 6.3. Ex. A Vermeer as 6.3. Ex. B Wang-91_1 as 7.3. Ex. A Discriminant_4 as 7.3. Ex. C Neff-89 as 8.3. Ex. A Butcher as 8.3. Ex. B Robot-RR as 9.3. Ex. A FourCircles as 7.3. Ex. B
